name: COKUNST Electric Wine Opener, Automatic Corkscrews Wine Bottles Openers, Battery Operated Reusable Wine Remover for Wine Lover Gift Home Kitchen Party
about_this_item: „ÄêPOWERFUL & DURABLE„Äë COKUNST automatic electric wine opener (Batteries Not Included) can help you open any traditional wine bottle with minimum effort. Noiseless and fast, it can safely remove corks in just about 5-7 seconds. Open up to 30-40 bottles one time

„ÄêEASY TO USE„Äë ‚ë† Just install the batteries firstly. ‚ë° Hold the wine opener vertically on the top of the bottle firmly and press the extract button. ‚ë¢ Press the upper release button when the cork is extracted, and it will come out automatically in seconds

„ÄêLIGHTWEIGHT & PROTABLE SIZE„ÄëOur corkscrews wine opener boasts a fashionable finish and protable size 9''H*1.8''W in size, making it perfectly sized for handholding and easy to store away when not in use. Wine opener weight about 210g, handy for you to carry around

„ÄêEXQUISITE DESIGN„ÄëThis wine bottle opener made of the high-quality ABS material and adopts the appearance of carbon crystal black in the overall color-matching design, dotted with two round CD pattern button switch. The overall effect is low-key and durable but presents a noble, fashion and exquisite feeling at the same time

„ÄêIDEAL GIFT„ÄëThis automatic electric wine opener is cordless, lightweight and elegant design, with foil cutter accessories, are the best choice for the gift to wine lover. Ideal for weddings, parties, bar, or home kitchen use

title: Did Not Work!
content: I got this to replace my electric wine opener and I am disappointed. I almost messed up a good bottle of wine with this thing. It does not have enough power to remove the cork.  It worked perfectly to screw into the cork but then it couldn't pull the cork all the way out. I reversed it and tried two more times and it still did not have enough power to pull the cork all the way out.  I ended up using my manual wine opener to finish the job of pulling the cork out. I gave it two stars since it can only do half the job.
